T02D2086:161b-1: tree satva sa m'a dhi sa m'a pa tti n'a ma //
T02D2086:161b-3: sems dpa' gsum gyi ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par gzhag pa zhes bya ba /
T02D2086:161b-4: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2086:161b-5: bskyed pa'i rim la legs gnas nas //
T02D2086:161b-6: rdzogs pa'i rim pa 'dod rnams kyis //
T02D2086:161b-7: rim gnyis rnam par gnas nas ni //
T02D2086:161b-8: spros pa med pa'i rang bzhin la //
T02D2086:161b-9: spros dang spros med ro mnyam blta //
T02D2086:161b-10: lam gyi snying por bsten pa ltar //
T02D2086:161b-11: gti mug dus dgra'i sku sogs su //
T02D2086:161b-13: gtso bo 'pho ba'i tshul du bsam //
T02D2086:161b-14: brtan nas ye shes sems dpa' ni //
T02D2086:161b-16: dngos kun dus dgra'i skur thal nas /
T02D2086:162a-0: @162a * // bsdus te bdag la thim gyur pas //
T02D2086:162a-1: bdag nyid yar thim thig ler gyur //
T02D2086:162a-2: thig ler ye shes 'khor lo dgod //
T02D2086:162a-3: de yi 'od kyi phreng ba yis //
T02D2086:162a-4: bdag sogs lha rnams gsal bar blta //
T02D2086:162a-6: snying ga'i ya yig dbus kyi h'um //
T02D2086:162a-7: spro dang bsdu ba'i rnal 'byor gyis //
T02D2086:162a-8: ji ltar dbugs rlung me long la //
T02D2086:162a-9: thim pa ji bzhin h'um yig bsam //
T02D2086:162a-10: chu skyes padma'i lte ba'i h'um //
T02D2086:162a-11: yungs kar tshad tsam aa la thim //
T02D2086:162a-12: snang ba 'od gsal ngang du rdzogs //
T02D2086:162a-13: dang ba'i chu las nya ldang bzhin //
T02D2086:162a-14: thams cad stong pa'i ting 'dzin las //
T02D2086:162a-15: mtha' drug dkyil 'khor rdzogs pa ni //
T02D2086:162a-16: rtag chad bdag gzhan ma yin la //
T02D2086:162a-18: phyi rol gzugs sogs yul snang rnams //
T02D2086:162a-19: bu ga'i lha yi snying gar bsdu //
T02D2086:162a-20: nang gi rnam rtog lha sku rnams //
T02D2086:162a-21: me shel lta bur snying gar thim //
T02D2086:162a-23: skar mda' lta bur rab 'phros pas //
T02D2086:162a-24: nam mkha'i bu ga rab 'byams khyab //
T02D2086:162a-25: rnal 'byor bzhi yi rim pa las //
T02D2086:162a-26: gang skyes ye shes phyag rgya che //
T02D2086:162a-27: mkha' ltar rang rig stong pa nyid //
T02D2086:162a-28: ro gcig mkha' mnyam ye shes bsgom //
T02D2086:162a-29: thog mtha' dbus kyi dbye ba yis //
T02D2086:162a-30: 'dir yang gcig tu yod min te //
T02D2086:162a-31: rdul phran la ni cha med phyir //
T02D2086:162a-32: du mar yang ni grub pa yin //
T02D2086:162a-33: gcig dang du ma'i rang bzhin du //
T02D2086:162a-34: gang zhig bral te chos nyid yin //
T02D2086:162a-36: sems kyi rang bzhin 'khrul pa med //
T02D2086:162a-37: bskyed rim spro bsdus sems rtogs don //
T02D2086:162a-38: ro gcig gyur pa chos kyi dbyings //
T02D2086:162a-39: de la byang chub mngon rtogs med //
T02D2086:162a-40: dngos por ma grub bsgom pa min //
T02D2086:162a-41: khams kyang min zhing rnam shes min //
T02D2086:162a-42: nam mkha'i dkyil dang mtshungs pa nyid //
T02D2086:162a-43: nam mkha' lta bur bdag med pa'i //
T02D2086:162a-44: chos ni bde ba chen po'o //
T02D2086:162a-45: 'byung bzhi ma yin nam mkha' min //
T02D2086:162a-46: rdo rje sems dpa'i sbyor ba yin //
T02D2086:162a-47: bskyed pa 'di la rab tu gnas //
T02D2086:162a-48: kun rdzob dngos kun dngos po min //
T02D2086:162a-49: de phyir de la dngos med bsgrag / rnal 'byor sems kyi sems rig pa //
T02D2086:162a-50: rtag chad phyag zhal sku mdog dang //
T02D2086:162b-0: gnyis @162b 'dzin dngos kun bden mod kyang //
T02D2086:162b-1: 'gag med nyams la sna tshogs snang //
T02D2086:162b-2: de ltar rig byas dkyil 'khor mchog / phung po khams su bdag med pa //
T02D2086:162b-3: bde ba dam pa'i gzugs can bsgom //
T02D2086:162b-4: sems dpa' gsum gyi rnal 'byor bzhi //
T02D2086:162b-7: spros pa thams cad rab zhi nas //
T02D2086:162b-8: spros med ye shes mngon sum du //
T02D2086:162b-9: 'gro ba kun gyis myong gyur nas //
T02D2086:162b-10: dus dgra mngon du byed gyur cig / bcom ldan
T02D2086:162b-11: 'das gshin rje'i gshed kyi bskyed rdzogs zung du 'jug
T02D2086:162b-12: pa'i man ngag sems dpa' gsum gyi ting nge 'dzin
T02D2086:162b-13: la mnyam par gzhag pa zhes bya ba /
T02D2086:162b-14: rdo rje phag ros dngos su byin gyis brlabs pa /
T02D2086:162b-15: mkhas shing grub pa brnyes pa'i rnal 'byor gyi dbang
T02D2086:162b-16: phyug sangs rgyas ye shes zhabs kyis mdzad pa rdzogs
T02D2086:162b-18: / yul dbus kyi pandi ta a'a nanda bha dra dang /
T02D2086:162b-19: bod kyi lo ts'a bsod nams rgyal mtshan gyis grong
T02D2086:162b-20: khyer chen po ti ra ha ti'i lho phyogs rang
T02D2086:162b-21: byung gi mchod rten rnam par dag pa'i drung du
T02D2086:162b-22: yul dbus kyi dpe dang mthun par bsgyur zhing bcos
T02D2086:162b-24: slar yang grub thob karna shr'i'i zhal snga nas mnyan
T02D2086:162b-25: te thar pa lo ts'a ba nyi ma rgyal mtshan
